name: Wonder Fruits
description:
Different levels and different puzzles are waiting for your challenges.
Colorful sweet fruits give you an abundance of fun.

Use a variety of boosters and items
Is it difficult to clear the level? Try various boosters and items.
Get ready to level up with bonus moves, fruits with cinnamon and fruit bombs.

Daily rewards and mini games are already waiting for you to provide the best gaming experience.

No internet connection needed.
Wonder Fruits can play everything perfectly without an internet connection.
